name: ACS-1007
language: Extended Basic, Fortran and Cobol delivered on disks
description:
This single-unit computer was sold in France in 1980. There were in fact three models :

- Series A with two tape-recorders,
- Series B with one disk-drive,
- Series C with a hard-disk (ACS-1740) ?

Three languages were delivered with the system : Extended Basic, Fortran and Cobol.
